meta_description: Electric Car (EV) Charging Station at 116 5th Ave, Huntington, WV 25703. Information provided by PlugShare, the world's most popular map for finding electric car (EV) charging stations.
name: McDonald's

photos.caption: Two units on west side of the McDonald's

reviews.comment: Thanks for the charge McDonald’s it is appreciated!

No longer a public reliable charger. McDonald's staff will unplug your car if you are not inside the restaurant. Even if you go through the drive thru and plug in while you eat they will come out and tell you "charging is for dine in customers only".  
I will go out of my way to a McDonald's under a different franchisee for all of my purchases now.
Destroyed and not functional. One has been vandalized. One blinks that's its charging but does not charge. Not maintained and nasty.
30 amp charging at 20 mph. No signs other than EV Parking only. No limits. Dining room closed for now due to COVID19.
Two old chargers and neither worked.

user.about: Secretary, West Virginia Electric Auto Association
Secretary, West Virginia Electric Auto Association

reviews.comment: We went in and asked for them to turn it on and they said it was on but one worked better than the other.  We tried both and got nothing.  We did find a J1772 adapter for a Tesla still attached in case anyone is missing one.

user.about: Secretary, West Virginia Electric Auto Association
Secretary, West Virginia Electric Auto Association

reviews.comment: You have to enter the McDonald's and ask them to activate the chargers... It took them about 30 minutes and me asking them twice for them to finally get around to it.
Had to plug in second time but charged ok.

user.about:
Retired EE.  Member EAA and current president local chapter "Appalachian Alternative Energy Association". 
Level II 20A reaches driveway.

reviews.comment: Nothing would happen when pressing the charge button

user.about:
Current Volt and Tesla MS driver.
Former Leaf driver. Never get a Nissan.
